Author: sugardeficiency
Text: I gave up purging years ago specially when learning about insulin spikes and how it controls access to fat cells for energy. Honestly I rather restrict to my BMR calories (look up BMR calculator/ then instead of putting your current weight, put your height and goal weight to maintain that goal weight instead) than purging and having a puffy face, bad skin and breath etc. You might as well eat than look ugly and greasy.
